Title: AN ACT TO IMPOSE A MORE SEVERE PENALTY FOR THE CRIME OF THEFT OF LARGE CATTLE.
Data:
[ Commonwealth Act No. 273, June 03, 1938 ]
AN ACT TO IMPOSE A MORE SEVERE PENALTY FOR THE CRIME OF THEFT OF LARGE CATTLE.
Be it enacted by the National Assembly of the Philippines:
Section 1. Article three hundred and ten of the Revised Penal Code is amended so as to read as follows:
"Article 310. Qualified theft.-The crime of theft shall be punished by the penalties next higher in degree than those respectively specified in the next preceding, article, if committed by a domestice servant, or with grave abuse of confidence, or if the property stolen consists of coconuts or fish taken from a fishpond or fishery.(aw√ûhi( The maximum period of the penalty prescribed in this article shall be imposed if the property stolen is large cattle."
Section 2. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.
Approved, June 3, 1938.
